divs: sighting detailslast night 9\6\2013, i was walking my dog around 9:00 p.m. (i took video at 8:58 p.m.) when i saw what i thought was a hot air balloon high in the sky, because i could see flames. this was moving in a straight line and too fast to be a balloon and way too high in the sky. then i thought that maybe it was a plane on fire but it wasn't falling and it kept moving across the sky. i took out my phone and videotaped it. i was really expecting for whatever it was to suddenly explode but it just kept moving across the sky until it the fire either went out or it just disappeared.
Summary: Fireball seen over Southside Easton, PA
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Easton
There were no other sightings in Easton on or around September 5th 2013
